textBeforeTable: Description Minimize's PP changed from 20 to 10. The moves Stomp, Steamroller, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, and Phantom Force will now never miss and their base power is doubled when used against the Minimize user. Generation VI Minimize now raises the user's evasion by two stages. Pokémon that have used Minimize will receive double damage from Steamroller. Generation V Pokémon that have used Minimize no longer have their sprite replaced with a tiny generic image. Generations III and IV Pokémon that have used Minimize will now receive double damage from Stomp. Generation II Minimize raises the user's evasion stat by one stage and replaces the user's regular image with a tiny, generic image until the user faints or is switched out, or the battle ends. Generation I Effect 7 In other languages A minimized Pokémon in Generations I and II
